column4: A trained soldier destined for greatness.
Notorious for leading groups of monsters on raids of defenseless villages.
A demon that sits on sleepers with a crushing weight, relishing on the paralyzed terror of its victims when they are forced awake.
The symbol of goodness itself, it grants the blessing of the gods to those it deems worthy.
Beware this false mount, for it finds delight in throwing its unsuspecting riders into the deep abyss.
Legend has is that whomever can capture this demon can make it his slave, but very few have been successful in catching it.
Mines in the deep underground for rare materials and untold treasures.
Many have tried to ride this creature, but only the ones it's deemed worthy have lived to tell the tale.
Even despite the horrible rumors surrounding its name, this creature is still willing to offer aid to humans. For a price.
Its friendly appearance masks its guise as it beckons travellers to their demise.
Farmers create straw effigies for this creature so it has a physical form to watch over the crops and animals with.
This creature follows the commands of a flute player, though it will punish its master if neglected.
A boneless, somewhat sentient glob created by the wastes and negativity of humans.
Be warned, this beautiful creature makes a fine wife, but death will come instantly to those who are not true to her.
A mystical mount that is rumored to use magic through its sharp horn.
A mysterious relative of the dragons, this creature is oft more friendly to humans, though harder to trust.
Those who keep a Å½altys in their house are blessed with protection and good luck.

Deals 3 times the boss's damage.
Deal 1.5 times the attacker's power.

Deals 1.5 times the boss's damage.
Summon two minions onto the field.
Cure any status ailments.
Grant target +5 defense.
Deals 1.5 times the boss's damage.
Restore target's HP by 40%
Deal damage proportional to the number of cards in the hand.
Deal 2.5 times the hero's attack power.
Restore target's HP by 75%
Adjacent enemies lose -2 health at the end of the turn for 5 turns. Canceling this card terminates its effects and no loss in health.
Target is paralyzed (unable to move) for 1 turn.
Take damage to heal an ally by 5 HP.
Deal 2 times the boss's damage.
Grant target +3 defense.
Deal 2 quick hits of reduced strength.
Deal 3 quick hits, with reduced damage.
